oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Weintz composite drawing, 1982 World's Fair
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Jerry Weintz
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Composite drawing representing participants and buildings of the 1982 World's Fair, including the Sunsphere. Done by Jerry Weintz, an artist for the 1982 World's Fair.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: 1982 World's Fair; Art; Artists;
